original_title: Sri Lanka inks contract agreement with Sinopec
original_body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); The President's Media Division said that a contract agreement Sinopec Fuel Oil Lanka (Pvt) Ltd & its parent company was signed at the President's Office on Monday (22).

It said that the negotiations with Sinopec Fuel Oil Lanka (Pvt) Ltd & its parent company in China & Singapore for long-term importation, storage, distribution, & sale of petroleum products completed and thereafter the Contract Agreement was signed.
Sri Lankans must understand the deep crisis, and together contribute to recovery.
Sri Lanka, IMF, and the Way Forward and IMF EXCLUSIVE with Newsline
Navy conducts high risk diving operation to recover bodies from overturned Chinese vessel
